<math display="block">A \cup B = B \cup A</math>

== Proof ==

* <math display="inline">\subseteq</math> 
** Let <math display="inline">x \in A \cup B</math> then <math display="inline">x \in A</math> or <math display="inline">x \in B</math>, therefore <math display="inline">x \in B \cup A</math>
* <math display="inline">\supseteq</math>
** Let <math display="inline">x \in B \cup A</math> then <math display="inline">x \in B</math> or <math display="inline">x \in A</math>, therefore <math display="inline">x \in A \cup B</math>
